contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Sheikha Hind Welcomes President of Turkmenistan to Education City

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Her Excellency Sheikha Hind bint Hamad Al Thani, Vice Chairperson and CEO of Qatar Foundation for Education, Science and Community Development (QF), today welcomed the president of Turkmenistan, H.E. Mr. Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedow, to Education City.

Her Excellency met the Turkmen presidentand the Turkmen delegation at QF Headquarters, along with Dr. Ahmed Hasnah, President of Hamad bin Khalifa University (HBKU), and Dr. Hamad Al-Ibrahim, Executive Vice President of Qatar Foundation Research and Development (QF R&D) and Mr. Omran Al Kuwari, Executive Director-CEO office.

During the visit, Sheikha Hind outlined to the Turkmen president how QF’s flagship development, Education City, serves as a hub of academic excellence, housing a range of educational facilities, from QF schools to partner universities and its homegrown institution, Hamad bin Khalifa University (HBKU).

pageContext.title: Sheikha Hind Welcomes President of Turkmenistan to Education City
